headline.main: Kohlberg Kravis Investing $50 Million in Cohera Medical

byline.original: By MICHAEL. J. DE LA MERCED

snippet: The investment in the Pittsburgh-based start-up is part of K.K.R.’s push into smaller growth-equity deals.
lead_paragraph: The investment in the Pittsburgh-based start-up is part of K.K.R.’s push into smaller growth-equity deals.
